column6: a bomb blast caused a death in Pouhum village
column9: Mondulkiri province.------The victim’s wife and nephew were interrogated at the scene------Authorities say a 33-year-old ethnic Phnong male took a knife to smash a can of ‘cherry bombs’ in order to make fishing bombs. The knife cause a blast
column10: which blew the knife into the victim’s eye.------An autopsy revealed that the victim had actually been killed by the explosion. After the examination
column11: the body was handed over to the family for traditional ceremonies.------WARNING! Very graphic images in the ------LINK
